Description: duties and responsibilitiesMaking bids on potential building projectsWorking with clients to determine requirements for building projectsDeveloping initial estimates on structure costs, building time and special requirementsPreparing detailed drawings showing both the appearance and interior structure of a building projectDirecting staff in the development of project drawings, studies and budgetsPreparing work contracts for building subcontractorsVisiting building worksites to ensure work is being done according to architectural plansDeveloping and giving presentations to inform the public about upcoming public building projectsSkills
Skills: Ability to work with architectural software to create building plans
Ability to create 3D View of drawings.
Ability to prepare and deliver presentations to large groups.
